Room.Name: Teal Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Teal Avenue, south of the city's eastern gate.
Room.LongDescription: On the west side of the avenue you can see the amphitheater and hear the music of the orchestra. Must be something interesting there tonight. On the east side there are several small foundries and specialized factories which produce the latest in armor and professional equipment for people who can afford their wares.
